extendedInfo.description: The Best Pick Reports/Home Reports Android app is your convenient one-stop shop for finding the best home service providers in your area. We currently serve the following metro-areas: Atlanta, Birmingham, Boston, Chicago, Dallas, Houston, Maryland, Northern Virginia, Philadelphia, and Washington, DC. With this app you can:â¢Quickly review your local Best Pick contractorsâ service information and reviewsâ¢Contact Best Picks immediatelyâ¢Save Best Picks to your Favorites listâ¢Share your Best Pick experiences via Facebook & Twitterâ¢Email contractor recommendations to friends and familyâ¢Access key consumer tips and FAQsâ¢Contact our Customer Service department with questions or assistance requestsBest Pick Reports/Home Reports is published by EBSCO Research, an independent research firm that qualifies home service providers annually through rigorous and unbiased third-party research â we do not accept any unsolicited or anonymous reviews.We are constantly conducting phone interviews with homeowners (resulting in hundreds of thousands of reviews in the past 3 years alone) to provide you with the best companies to choose from. In addition to our extensive research, each company must meet additional requirements to receive their Best Pick certification: they must excel in our research with more than 100 reviews; they must carry the proper state-required insurances and professional licenses; they must honor contracts made with homeowners and suppliers; and they must sign our Best Pick company pledge (check it out on our website: www.BestPickReports.com). We also provide personal customer service support â so feel free to contact us with any additional questions or if you need assistance with anything: AppHelpDesk@EBSCOResearch.com

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Gives pretty good, detailed info on local companies.
reviews.author: Karie Norman

reviews.title: Convenient
reviews.comment: Has worked well for me so far, definitely helpful when you\'re on the go and need to find someone fast!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I\'ve used best pick reports religiously since they came to Virginia, and this has already come in handy a few times.
reviews.author: A Google User
